getRequestUriAttribute

public static java.lang.String getRequestUriAttribute(ServletRequest request)
Obtains the request URI that has been previously been stored via #setRequestUriAttribute(ServletRequest, String) from a request.
param:
request request where to obtain the URI from.
return:
request URI.

return:

setRequestUriAttribute

public static void setRequestUriAttribute(ServletRequest request, java.lang.String uri)
Stores a request uri as request attribute. The request attribute name is #REQUEST_URI_ATTRIBUTE_NAME.
param:
request request where to store the URI.
param:
uri request URI.
